description:
SVL12000 (ALC PRESS INC.) looked up in the Oxford Dictionary of English (en.oxforddictionaries.com)

Ver.180215-0828 –Abridged Edition– [Brought to you by h​onya#1726]

deck.question:
1. [determiner] Used when mentioning someone or something for the first time in a text or conversation.
2. [determiner] Used to indicate membership of a class of people or things.
3. In, to, or for each; per (used when expressing rates or ratios).
deck.comment:
Lv.01/12: [冠] 一つの
‘a man came out of the room’

deck.question:
1. [with infinitive] Having the power, skill, means, or opportunity to do something.
2. Having considerable skill, proficiency, or intelligence.
deck.comment:
Lv.01/12: [形] 〜できる
‘he was able to read Greek at the age of eight’

deck.question:
1. On the subject of; concerning.
2. [preposition] Used to indicate movement within a particular area.
3. [preposition] Used to express location in a particular place.
deck.comment:
Lv.01/12: [前] 〜について
‘I was thinking about you’

deck.question:
1. In extended space over and not touching.
2. At a higher level or layer than.
3. Higher than (a specified amount, rate, or norm).
deck.comment:
Lv.01/12: [前] 〜の上
‘a display of fireworks above the town’

deck.question:
1. From one side to the other of (a place, area, etc.).
2. [preposition & adverb] Expressing position or orientation.
3. [as adverb] Referring to a crossword answer which reads horizontally.
deck.comment:
Lv.01/12: [前] 〜を横切って
‘I ran across the street’

deck.question:
1. A thing done; a deed.
2. [in singular] A pretence.
3. A written law passed by Parliament, Congress, etc.
4. A main division of a play, ballet, or opera.
deck.comment:
Lv.01/12: [名] 行為、言動
‘a criminal act’

deck.question:
1. [predicative] Feeling fear or anxiety; frightened.
 1. Worried that something undesirable will occur or be done.
 2. [with infinitive] Unwilling or reluctant to do something for fear of the consequences.
 3. (– for) Anxious about the well-being or safety of.
deck.comment:
Lv.01/12: [形] 恐れて、怖がって
‘I'm afraid of dogs’

deck.question:
1. In the time following (an event or another period of time).
2. Behind.
3. In pursuit or quest of.
4. Next to and following in order or importance.
5. In allusion to (someone or something with the same or a related name).
deck.comment:
Lv.01/12: [前] 〜の後
‘shortly after their marriage they moved to Colorado’

deck.question: The time from noon or lunchtime to evening.
deck.comment:
Lv.01/12: [名] 午後
‘I telephoned this afternoon’

deck.question:
1. Another time; once more.
 1. Returning to a previous position or condition.
 2. In addition to what has already been mentioned.
 3. [sentence adverb] Used to introduce a further point for consideration, supporting or contrasting with what has just been said.
deck.comment:
Lv.01/12: [副] また、もう一度
‘it was great to meet old friends again’

deck.question:

2. In anticipation of and preparation for (a problem or difficulty).
3. In or into physical contact with (something), so as to be supported by or collide with it.
4. In conceptual contrast to.
deck.comment:
Lv.01/12: [前] 反対して、逆らって
‘the fight against crime’

deck.question:
1. The length of time that a person has lived or a thing has existed.
 1. A particular stage in someone's life.
 2. [mass noun] The state of being old.
2. A distinct period of history.
 1. ‹Geology› A division of time that is a subdivision of an epoch, corresponding to a stage in chronostratigraphy.
 2. (–s/an –) «informal» A very long time.
deck.comment:
Lv.01/12: [名] 年齢
‘he died from a heart attack at the age of 51’

deck.question: Before the present; earlier (used with a measurement of time).
deck.comment:
Lv.01/12: [副] 〜前に
‘he went five minutes ago’

deck.question:
1. [mass noun] The invisible gaseous substance surrounding the earth, a mixture mainly of oxygen and nitrogen.
2. An impression of a quality or manner given by someone or something.
3. ‹Music› A tune or short melodious song.
4. A jump off the ground on a snowboard or skateboard.
deck.comment:
Lv.01/12: [名] 空気
‘the air was stale’

deck.question: A powered flying vehicle with fixed wings and a weight greater than that of the air it displaces.
deck.comment:
Lv.01/12: [名] 飛行機
‘I am, of course, fully aware of the very significant differences between aeroplanes and helicopters.’

deck.question:
1. A complex of runways and buildings for the take-off, landing, and maintenance of civil aircraft, with facilities for passengers.
 1. [as modifier] Relating to or denoting light popular fiction such as is offered for sale to travellers in airports.
deck.comment:
Lv.01/12: [名] 空港

deck.question:

2. A collection of recordings issued as a single item on CD, record, or another medium.
deck.comment:
Lv.01/12: [名] アルバム

deck.question:
1. [pronoun, determiner, & predeterminer] Used to refer to the whole quantity or extent of a particular group or thing.

Lv.01/12: [形] 全て、全部
‘all the people I met’

deck.question: Not quite; very nearly.
deck.comment:
Lv.01/12: [副] ほとんど
‘he almost knocked Georgina over’

deck.question:
1. Having no one else present; on one's own.
 1. [as adverb] Without others' help or participation; single-handed.
 2. [as adjective] Isolated and lonely.
2. [adverb & adjective] [as adverb] Indicating that something is confined to the specified subject or recipient.
 1. Used to emphasize that only one factor out of several is being considered and that the whole is greater or more extreme.
deck.comment:
Lv.01/12: [形] ただひとり、単独で
‘she was alone that evening’

deck.question:
1. Moving in a constant direction on (a more or less horizontal surface).
2. [preposition] Extending in a more or less horizontal line on.
3. [adverb] In or into company with others.
deck.comment:
Lv.01/12: [前] 〜に沿って
‘soon we were driving along a narrow road’

deck.question:
1. Before or by now or the time in question.
 1. As surprisingly soon or early as this.
2. [adverb] «informal» Used after a word or phrase to express impatience.
deck.comment:
Lv.01/12: [副] 既に、もう

deck.question: In addition; too.
deck.comment:
Lv.01/12: [副] 〜もまた、さらに
‘a brilliant linguist, he was also interested in botany’

deck.question:
1. At all times; on all occasions.
 1. Throughout a long period of the past.
 2. For all future time; forever.
 3. Repeatedly and annoyingly.
2. As a last resort; failing all else.
deck.comment:
Lv.01/12: [副] いつも
‘the sun always rises in the east’

deck.question: first person singular present of be.

1. Situated more or less centrally in relation to (several other things).
2. Being a member or members of (a larger set).
3. Occurring in or shared by (some members of a group or community).
4. [preposition] Indicating a division, choice, or differentiation involving three or more participants.
deck.comment:
Lv.01/12: [前] 〜の間に
‘flowers hidden among the roots of the trees’

deck.question: The form of the indefinite article used before words beginning with a vowel sound.
deck.comment: Lv.01/12: [冠] 一つの

deck.question:
1. [conjunction] Used to connect words of the same part of speech, clauses, or sentences, that are to be taken jointly.
2. [conjunction] Used to introduce an additional comment or interjection.
3. [conjunction] «informal» Used after some verbs and before another verb to indicate intention, instead of ‘to’.
deck.comment:
Lv.01/12: [接] ...と...
‘bread and butter’

deck.question:
1. Feeling or showing strong annoyance, displeasure, or hostility; full of anger.
 1. (of the sea or sky) stormy, turbulent, or threatening.
 2. (of a wound or sore) red and inflamed.
deck.comment:
Lv.01/12: [形] 怒っている
‘why are you angry with me?’

deck.question:
1. A living organism which feeds on organic matter, typically having specialized sense organs and nervous system and able to respond rapidly to stimuli.
 1. Any such living organism other than a human being.
 2. A mammal, as opposed to a bird, reptile, fish, or insect.
 3. A person without human attributes or civilizing influences, especially someone who is very cruel, violent, or repulsive.
deck.comment:
Lv.01/12: [名] 動物
‘wild animals adapt badly to a caged life’

deck.question:
1. [determiner & pronoun] Used to refer to an additional person or thing of the same type as one already mentioned or known about; one more; a further.
 1. [as determiner] Used with a proper name to indicate someone or something's similarity to the person or event specified.
2. [determiner & pronoun] Used to refer to a different person or thing from one already mentioned or known about.
 1. [as determiner] Used to refer to someone sharing an attribute in common with the person already mentioned.
deck.comment:
Lv.01/12: [形] もう一つの、別の
‘have another drink’

deck.question:
1. [reporting verb] Say or write something as a reaction to someone or something.
2. [with object] Act in reaction to (a sound such as a telephone ringing or a knock or ring on a door).
3. [no object] (– to) Be responsible or report to (someone).
4. [with object] Defend oneself against (a charge, accusation, or criticism).
5. [with object] Be suitable for fulfilling (a need); satisfy.
deck.comment:
Lv.01/12: [動] 答える

deck.question:
1. [pronoun & determiner] [usually with negative or in questions] Used to refer to one or some of a thing or number of things, no matter how much or how many.
 1. Anyone.
2. Whichever of a specified class might be chosen.
deck.comment:
Lv.01/12: [形] どんな、どれでも

deck.question: Anyone.
deck.comment:
Lv.01/12: [代] だれでも

deck.question:

 1. [without negative] Used for emphasis.
2. A person of importance or authority.

Lv.01/12: [代] だれか、だれも
‘there wasn't anyone there’

deck.question:

Lv.01/12: [名] リンゴ

Lv.01/12: [名] 腕

deck.question:

deck.question:

Lv.06/12: [形] 利己的でない
‘unselfish devotion’

deck.question:
1. Liable to fall or shake; not steady in position.
 1. Not regular in pitch or rhythm.
deck.comment:
Lv.06/12: [形] 不安定な
‘he was very unsteady on his feet’

deck.question: Not successful.
deck.comment:
Lv.06/12: [形] 失敗した、不運の
‘an unsuccessful attempt to enter Parliament’

deck.question: Not fitting or appropriate.
deck.comment:
Lv.06/12: [形] 不適当な
‘the display is unsuitable for young children’

deck.question:
1. Not arranged neatly and in order.
 1. Not inclined to keep one's possessions or appearance neat and in order.
deck.comment:
Lv.06/12: [動] 散らかす
‘the place was dreadfully untidy’

deck.question: (of a person or action) not wise or sensible; foolish.
deck.comment:
Lv.06/12: [形] 愚かな
‘it is unwise to rely on hearsay evidence’

deck.question:
1. Not deserving respect or attention.
 1. (of an action) not acceptable, especially from someone with a good reputation or social position.
 2. Having little merit.
deck.comment:
Lv.06/12: [形] 価値のない
‘he was unworthy of trust and unfit to hold office’

deck.question: The quality or fact of being useful.
deck.comment:
Lv.06/12: [名] 有用性
‘faults that affect the book's usefulness’

deck.question:
1. [mass noun] The state of being useful, profitable, or beneficial.
2. An organization supplying the community with electricity, gas, water, or sewerage.
3. ‹Computing› A utility program.
4. A utility vehicle.
deck.comment:
Lv.06/12: [名] 有益
‘he had a poor opinion of the utility of book learning’

deck.question: Make practical and effective use of.
deck.comment:
Lv.06/12: [動] 利用する、活用する
‘vitamin C helps your body utilize the iron present in your diet’

deck.question: [attributive] Most extreme; greatest.
deck.comment:
Lv.06/12: [形] 最高の
‘a matter of the utmost importance’

deck.question:
1. (of a place) not occupied; empty.
 1. (of a position or employment) not filled.
2. Having or showing no intelligence or interest.
deck.comment:
Lv.06/12: [形] 空の
‘40 per cent of the offices are still vacant’

deck.question:
1. (of an argument or point) having a sound basis in logic or fact; reasonable or cogent.
 1. Legally binding due to having been executed in compliance with the law.
 2. Legally or officially acceptable.
deck.comment:
Lv.06/12: [形] 合法的な、有効な
‘a valid criticism’

deck.question: Having no value; worthless.
deck.comment:
Lv.06/12: [形] 無価値な
‘cherished but valueless heirlooms’

deck.question:
1. [mass noun] Excessive pride in or admiration of one's own appearance or achievements.
2. [mass noun] The quality of being worthless or futile.
3. A dressing table.
deck.comment:
Lv.06/12: [名] 虚栄心、空虚
‘it flattered his vanity to think I was in love with him’

deck.question: Incorporating a number of different types or elements; showing variation or variety.
deck.comment:
Lv.06/12: [形] さまざまの
‘the phenomena were very varied’

deck.question:
1. A closely woven fabric of silk, cotton, or nylon, that has a thick short pile on one side.
 1. Soft downy skin that covers a deer's antler while it is growing.
deck.comment:
Lv.06/12: [名] ビロード
‘an armchair covered in velvet’

deck.question:
1. Deliberately cruel or violent.
2. «literary» Immoral.
3. «archaic» (of language or a line of reasoning) imperfect; defective.
deck.comment:
Lv.06/12: [形] 凶悪な
‘a vicious assault’

deck.question:
1. A person who looks at or inspects something.
 1. A person watching television or a film.
2. A device for looking at film transparencies or similar photographic images.
deck.comment:
Lv.06/12: [名] 視聴者
‘the viewer of paintings or sculpture’

deck.question:
1. Strong, healthy, and full of energy.
 1. Characterized by or involving physical strength, effort, or energy.
 2. (of language) forceful.
deck.comment:
Lv.06/12: [形] 精力的な
‘a tall, vigorous, and muscular man’

deck.question:
1. (especially in continental Europe) a large and luxurious country house in its own grounds.
 1. [in place names] A detached or semi-detached house in a residential district, typically one that is Victorian or Edwardian in style.
 2. A rented holiday home abroad.
2. A large country house of Roman times, having an estate and consisting of farm and residential buildings arranged around a courtyard.
deck.comment:
Lv.06/12: [名] 別荘
‘Madison Villas’

deck.question: The action of violating someone or something.
deck.comment:
Lv.06/12: [名] 違反
‘the aircraft were in violation of UN resolutions’

deck.question:
1. A person who has never had sexual intercourse.
2. A person who is naive, innocent, or inexperienced in a particular context.
3. ‹Entomology› A female insect that produces eggs without being fertilized.
deck.comment:
Lv.06/12: [名] 処女
‘she's still a virgin’

deck.question:
1. Almost or nearly as described, but not completely or according to strict definition.
2. ‹Computing› Not physically existing as such but made by software to appear to do so.
3. ‹Optics› Relating to the points at which rays would meet if produced backwards.
4. ‹Mechanics› Relating to or denoting infinitesimal displacements of a point in a system.
5. ‹Physics› Denoting particles or interactions with extremely short lifetimes and (owing to the uncertainty principle) indefinitely great energies, postulated as intermediates in some processes.
deck.comment:
Lv.06/12: [形] 実質上の
‘the virtual absence of border controls’

deck.question:
1. An infective agent that typically consists of a nucleic acid molecule in a protein coat, is too small to be seen by light microscopy, and is able to multiply only within the living cells of a host.
 1. An infection or disease caused by a virus.
 2. A harmful or corrupting influence.
2. A piece of code which is capable of copying itself and typically has a detrimental effect, such as corrupting the system or destroying data.
deck.comment:
Lv.06/12: [名] ウイルス
‘the hepatitis B virus’

deck.question:
1. The state of being strong and active; energy.
 1. The power giving continuance of life, present in all living things.
deck.comment:
Lv.06/12: [名] 活力
‘changes that will give renewed vitality to our democracy’

deck.question:
1. Relating to the human voice.
2. (of music) consisting of or incorporating singing.
3. [adjective] Expressing opinions or feelings freely or loudly.
deck.comment:
Lv.06/12: [形] 口頭の
‘non-linguistic vocal effects like laughs and sobs’

deck.question: An electromotive force or potential difference expressed in volts.
deck.comment:
Lv.06/12: [名] 電圧
‘the ratio of two voltages’

deck.question:
1. Done, given, or acting of one's own free will.
 1. ‹Physiology› Under the conscious control of the brain.
2. Working, done, or maintained without payment.
 1. ‹Law› (of a conveyance or disposition) made without return in money or other consideration.
deck.comment:
Lv.06/12: [形] 自発的な
‘we are funded by voluntary contributions’

deck.question: A person who votes or has the right to vote at an election.
deck.comment:
Lv.06/12: [名] 投票者、有権者
‘Hence the political strength of the citizen body as voters in the citizen assembly.’

deck.question:
1. A speech sound which is produced by comparatively open configuration of the vocal tract, with vibration of the vocal cords but without audible friction, and which is a unit of the sound system of a language that forms the nucleus of a syllable.
 1. A letter representing a vowel sound, such as a, e, i, o, u.
deck.comment:
Lv.06/12: [名] 母音
‘Vowels so marked are described as long, and unmarked vowels are short, a distinction known as vowel length.’

deck.question:
1. The large wrinkled edible seed of a deciduous tree, consisting of two halves contained within a hard shell which is enclosed in a green fruit.
2. The tall tree which produces walnuts, with compound leaves and valuable ornamental timber that is used chiefly in cabinetmaking and gun stocks.
deck.comment:
Lv.06/12: [名] クルミ
‘All I remembered about the salad was Roquefort, fennel, walnuts, Burgundy-poached pears, and dried figs on the greens.’

deck.question:
1. A document issued by a legal or government official authorizing the police or another body to make an arrest, search premises, or carry out some other action relating to the administration of justice.
2. [mass noun, usually with negative] Justification or authority for an action, belief, or feeling.
3. An official certificate of appointment issued to an officer of lower rank than a commissioned officer.
deck.comment:
Lv.06/12: [名] 令状
‘magistrates issued a warrant for his arrest’

deck.question: (of a person, action, or process) using or expending something of value carelessly, extravagantly, or to no purpose.
deck.comment:
Lv.06/12: [形] 無駄な
‘wasteful energy consumption’

deck.question:
1. A dog kept to guard private property.
 1. A person or group that monitors the practices of companies providing a particular service or utility.
deck.comment:
Lv.06/12: [名] 番犬
‘the consumer watchdog for transport in London’

deck.question:
1. Watching someone or something closely; alert and vigilant.
 1. «archaic» Wakeful; sleepless.
deck.comment:
Lv.06/12: [形] 用心深い
‘they attended dances under the watchful eye of their father’

deck.question:
1. A man employed to look after an empty building, especially at night.
 1. «historical» A member of a body of people employed to keep watch in a town at night.
deck.comment:
Lv.06/12: [名] 警備員
‘a night watchman’

deck.question:
1. Artists' paint made with a water-soluble binder such as gum arabic, and thinned with water rather than oil, giving a transparent colour.
 1. [count noun] A picture painted with watercolours.
 2. The art of painting with watercolours, especially using a technique of producing paler colours by diluting rather than by adding white.
deck.comment:
Lv.06/12: [名] 水彩画
‘a self-portrait in watercolour’

deck.question: A cascade of water falling from a height, formed when a river or stream flows over a precipice or steep incline.
deck.comment:
Lv.06/12: [名] 滝
‘It flew in search of waterfalls that fell off the hills and flowed in serpentine paths on the plains.’

deck.question:
1. Impervious to water.
 1. Not liable to be washed away by water.
deck.comment:
Lv.06/12: [形] 防水の
‘a waterproof hat’

deck.question: Sickly; not robust.
deck.comment:
Lv.06/12: [形] 弱い
‘if the lambs were weakly we had to feed them by hand’

deck.question:
1. In contrast or comparison with the fact that.
 1. (especially in legal preambles) taking into consideration the fact that.
deck.comment:
Lv.06/12: [接] ...であるのに
‘you treat the matter lightly, whereas I myself was never more serious’

deck.question:
1. Move or cause to move rapidly round and round.
 1. [no object, with adverbial of direction] «figurative» Move or cause to move rapidly.
 2. [no object] (of the head, mind, or senses) seem to spin round.
deck.comment:
Lv.06/12: [動] 渦巻く
‘leaves whirled in eddies of wind’

deck.question:
1. The property or quality of being white in colour.
 1. The quality of being very pale.
2. The fact or state of belonging to a human group having light-coloured skin.
deck.comment:
Lv.06/12: [名] 純粋、純白
‘a landscape dominated by the whiteness of snow’

deck.question: Make or become wider.
deck.comment:
Lv.06/12: [動] 広くする、広げる
‘we should widen the scope of our investigation’

deck.question:
1. The action of withdrawing something.
 1. [count noun] An act of taking money out of an account.
 2. The action of ceasing to participate in an activity.
 3. The process of ceasing to take an addictive drug.
deck.comment:
Lv.06/12: [名] 撤退
‘the withdrawal of legal aid’

deck.question:
1. Made wholly or partly of wool.
 1. Relating to the production of wool.
deck.comment:
Lv.06/12: [形] 羊毛の
‘thick woollen blankets’

deck.question:
1. A man employed to do manual labour.
 1. [with adjective] A person with specified skill in a job or craft.
deck.comment:
Lv.06/12: [名] 工員、肉体労働者
‘you check it through, like all good workmen do’

deck.question:
1. (of a person) experienced and sophisticated.
2. Of or concerned with material values or ordinary life rather than a spiritual existence.
deck.comment:
Lv.06/12: [形] この世の
‘she was much more worldly than Nora and dismissed the slur’

deck.question:
1. Show reverence and adoration for (a deity).
 1. [no object] Take part in a religious ceremony.
 2. Feel great admiration or devotion for.
deck.comment:
Lv.06/12: [動] 崇拝する
‘the Maya built jungle pyramids to worship their gods’

deck.question:
1. Having no real value or use.
 1. (of a person) having no good qualities; deserving contempt.
deck.comment:
Lv.06/12: [形] 価値のない
‘that promise is worthless’

deck.question: Worth the time, money, or effort spent; of value or importance.
deck.comment:
Lv.06/12: [形] 価値がある
‘extra lighting would make a worthwhile contribution to road safety’

deck.question:
1. A slight line or fold in something, especially fabric or the skin of the face.
 1. «informal» A minor difficulty; a snag.
2. «informal» A clever innovation, or useful piece of information or advice.
deck.comment:
Lv.06/12: [名] しわ
‘she smoothed out the wrinkles from her skirt’

deck.question:
1. In a way that is incorrect or mistaken.
2. In an unjust, dishonest, or immoral way.
deck.comment:
Lv.06/12: [副] 不法に
‘my name is spelled wrongly’
